ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We took revenge on them as well. They are both beside a well-beaten track.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So We punished them too. They are both situated by the highway, clearly visible.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So We chastised them. The desolate locations of both communities lie on a well-known highway.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We afflicted them with punishment. Both people had clear (divine) authority among them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We therefore took revenge from them; and indeed both these townships are situated on an open road.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, We took vengeance on them. They are both on an open route, plain to see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So We inflicted retribution on them, and they are both, indeed, on an open road (still) pursued.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and We took vengeance on them. The two of them were upon a roadway manifest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So we took vengeance on them; and lo! they both are on a high-road plain to see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So We took vengeance on them. Both are still there on the highway, plain for all to see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So We took vengeance on them. And verily both are on a high-road open.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So We took vengeance on them, and indeed the two of them are on an open highway.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So We exacted retribution from them. They were both on an open highway, plain to see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So, We took vengeance on them. They are both on an open highway, plain to see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: On them, too, We took vengeance, and they are both on a clear roadway.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So We took revenge upon them. Both are clearly documented.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So We took retribution from them, and indeed, both [cities] are on a clear highway.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:79] So We exacted retribution from them, by destroying them through extreme heat. And certainly both of them, that is, the cities of the people of Lot and those of [the dwellers in] the wood, are upon a open road, plain [to see]: so will you not take heed from their example, O people of Mecca?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: So We took vengeance on them) in this worldly life by means of chastisement; (and lo! they both) the ownships of Lot and Shu'ayb (are on a high road plain to see) and which they do pass by.
